Title: Embroidered Illusion Evening Dress

----

Sku: P105

Sizes: 16, 12, 14, 10, 8, 6, 4

Colors: green

Category: evening

Featured-image: P105-green-embroidered-illusion-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Sweetly embroidered bodice with floral pattern and nude sheer fabric flowing into the back of the gown. The small oval cut out in the back is trimmed with the embroidery. The A-line gown is mini dress with a floor length skirt covering. The high split shows the mini skirt underneath.
